Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.tui

package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.tui
Provides classes for the Text User Interface (TUI) of the financial accounting system. These classes handle all direct user interactions and display, operating at the top layer of the application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui
    This package is responsible for all user interface components.
    cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.controllers
    Contains controller classes that manage user interactions, bridging the user interface with application services to process and respond to user input.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    TUIAddRecord
    Text User Interface for adding records to the financial accounting system.
    TUIClearConsole
    Provides utility methods for clearing the console screen in a text-based user interface.
    TUICore
    Main class for text user interface core functionality.
    TUIHelloMessage
    Provides a welcome message for the application in the text-based user interface.
    TUILogin
    Handles the login process in the text-based user interface.
    TUIMainMenu
    Represents the main menu in the text-based user interface.
    TUISettings
    Text-based user interface component for managing application settings.
    TUIShowRecords
    Text-based user interface component responsible for displaying records.
    TUIShowStatistics
    Handles the presentation of statistical data in the text user interface.
